se.chalmers.dat255.risk.model

Interface IProvince

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Province

    public interface IProvince
    Interface for provinces.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds units to this province

      Fetches the string identification of this province

    • Method Detail

      • getUnits

        int getUnits()
        Getter for units in the province
        Returns:
        the number of units in the province

      • addUnits

        void addUnits(int units)
        Adds units to this province
        Parameters:
        units - number of units to be added

      • removeUnits

        void removeUnits(int units)
        Removes units from this province
        Parameters:
        units - number of units to be removed

      • moveUnits

        void moveUnits(int units,
             IProvince province)
        Move units forom this province to another province. Used in F2 after gaining a province and in F3.
        Parameters:
        units - number of units to be moved
        province - the province to receive the units

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Fetches the string identification of this province
        Returns:
        the name(ID) of this province

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Checks if the province is in an active state. An active province is prepared to attack, move units etc.
        Returns:
        true if the province is active

      • setActive

        void setActive(boolean active)
        Sets the state of this province.
        Parameters:
        active - the new state of the province
